statements: SELECT * FROM SubscriptionPackages;
SELECT package_name, price, start_date FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE price > 50;
SELECT subscription_id, package_name, discount_rate FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE package_name LIKE '%Gold%';
SELECT subscription_id, price, end_date FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE price > 100 AND discount_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY end_date DESC
SELECT package_name, price FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE start_date > '2022-07-01' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT subscription_id, package_name, discount_rate FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200
SELECT * FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE package_name LIKE '%Silver%' AND start_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT subscription_id, price, end_date FROM SubscriptionPackages WHERE discount_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY subscription_id ASC
SELECT * FROM subscriptions;
SELECT subscription_name, discount_percentage FROM subscriptions WHERE discount_percentage > 0;
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_name FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_name LIKE '%gold%';
SELECT promotion_name FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_id = 1;
SELECT subscription_id, subscription_name FROM subscriptions WHERE discount_percentage > 0.00;
SELECT subscription_name, discount_percentage FROM subscriptions ORDER BY subscription_name DESC;
SELECT subscription_name, discount_percentage FROM subscriptions WHERE discount_percentage < 5.00 ORDER BY discount_percentage DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_code FROM promotions WHERE promotion_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subscription_packages ORDER BY subscription_id DESC;
SELECT package_name, price FROM subscription_packages WHERE price >= 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT subscription_id, package_name, price, discount_rate FROM subscription_packages WHERE discount_rate > 0 ORDER BY discount_rate DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_rate, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE subscription_id = 100 AND start_date <= '2023-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM subscription_packages WHERE price > 100
SELECT package_name, price, discount_rate FROM subscription_packages WHERE discount_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-06-30'
SELECT package_name, discount_code FROM subscription_packages JOIN discounts ON subscription_packages.subscription_id = discounts.subscription_id
SELECT * FROM discounts WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM discounts;
SELECT discount_description, discount_percentage FROM discounts;
SELECT * FROM subscription_packages ORDER BY package_price DESC;
SELECT package_name, package_price FROM subscription_packages WHERE package_price < 50.00;
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions;
SELECT * FROM discounts;
SELECT discount_id, discount_percentage, discount_description FROM discounts ORDER BY discount_percentage ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscription_packages WHERE package_price > 50.00;
SELECT promotion_id, promotion_name FROM promotions WHERE LENGTH(promotion_description) > 50;

SELECT package_name, package_price, discount_percentage FROM subscription_packages JOIN package_discounts ON subscription_packages.package_id = package_discounts.package_id JOIN discounts ON package_discounts.discount_id = discounts.discount_id;
SELECT * FROM subscription_packages;
SELECT package_name, monthly_price FROM subscription_packages;
SELECT package_id, discount_code FROM subscription_packages WHERE monthly_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT promotion_name, promotion_description FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM subscription_packages;
SELECT package_name, monthly_price FROM subscription_packages ORDER BY monthly_price DESC;
SELECT package_name, discount_code FROM subscription_packages WHERE discount_code IS NOT NULL;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.package_name, pr.promotion_name, d.discount_percentage FROM subscription_packages p JOIN package_promotions pp ON p.package_id = pp.package_id JOIN promotions pr ON pp.promotion_id = pr.promotion_id JOIN package_discounts pd ON p.package_id = pd.package_id JOIN discounts d ON pd.discount_id = d.discount_id WHERE d.discount_percentage > 10;
